snippet: Jungho Kang hit a two-run homer to give South Korea a 3-2 victory over Taiwan in a World Baseball Classic game, but the South Koreans lost a tiebreaker to the Netherlands.
abstract: South Korea beats Taiwan, 3-2, in World Baseball Classic game but fails to advance because they lost tie-breaker against Netherlands.
lead_paragraph: Jungho Kang hit a two-run homer to give South Korea a 3-2 victory over Taiwan in a World Baseball Classic game, but the South Koreans lost a tiebreaker to the Netherlands.

headline.seo: South Korea Wins but Misses Out
headline.main: South Korea Wins but Misses Out
headline.print_headline: South Korea Wins but Misses Out
